WorkItem.Description:
Rawr b4.0.12.0
 
Items such as Key to the Endless Chamber, Vial of Stolen Memories, Symbiotic Worm, etc., lose their procs when refreshed from Wowhead.
 
(Refresh from Armory doesn't have the same effect, but then it doesn't put the proc back on after refreshing from Wowhead so it's not clear that Refresh from Armory is actually doing anything at all.)
 
Only workround appears to be "don't do that" or reset the item cache.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Trinket procs lost on Wowhead Item Refresh

Comments.Message:
Refrsh from armory doesn't work
Many of the new trinkets haven't been parsed in Rawr yet. Hina added them by hand.
Basically, don't do that to anything from cata with a proc on it if you don't want to have to fix it.
Make us a list of all the items with broken parsing and we'll fix the parsing
I am currently in the process of adding the procs to the parser at the moment.
As Hina is working on this at present, I'll just make myself a note to try refreshing trinkets after the next release and report any that don't appear to parse correctly at that point.
Thanks everybody! This continues to be an issue - I'm glad you're aware of it. 56400, 56407, 58183 appear to have this issue still.
